name: Bee8Jump
description:
Bee8Jump is a 2D platformer game. It was created by my son Moritz (14 years old at that time) in the context of a Montessori school project and was a practical work over a six month period. The goal was to create a 2D game, which runs under a variety of devices.

The result is a mixed bag of Flappy Bird and Geometry Dash.

Enjoy playing!
